title: The Beginning
description: Erin is a 15 year old girl, born with a birthmark covering the left side of her face.She moves to her parentâ€™s home town of Galladale, where all is not what it seems.From day one, Erin is bullied by Jessica, for looking at Sean.Why is she trying to keep Erin away? Will the bullying ever stop? Can Erin control the fire that builds inside her?
author: Lavinia Urban
